OK so I didn't blog for the past two days. I've had two full days. It's more important not to fall than not to stumble.

Saturday involved a trip to the Epping Railway and a trip though the lovely countryside for my Dad's birthday. The evening involved rushing to see of my good friend Sam, who's leaving England to ply his trade on the west coast, Los Angeles. I'll miss him.

Sunday involved a hungover shamble around Brighton for Breakfast in Kemptown, an ice cream at Marrocoo's, and a swim in the sea. Not a bad end to the week.
